requirement_tested: Display a course catalog with searchable and filterable course listings
user_persona: A cybersecurity professional looking to upskill in risk management.
user_goal: To find beginner-level courses in Risk Management using the search and filter tools.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Course Catalog
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the course catalog page and sees a grid of course cards. She wants to narrow down her choices to relevant topics.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the filter icon next to the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The filter options panel slides open, showing categories, levels, and certification tracks.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Sarah selects 'Risk Management' under Category and 'Beginner' under Level to focus on foundational courses.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Risk Management' from category filter and 'Beginner' from level filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The course list dynamically updates to show only beginner-level risk management courses.

narrative_steps.title: Searching Within Results
narrative_steps.description: She remembers hearing about a course titled 'Threat Assessment' and decides to search for it specifically.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Threat Assessment' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The displayed course list further narrows down to show only those matching the term 'Threat Assessment'.

requirement_tested: Show detailed course information pages including descriptions, prerequisites, duration, and instructors
user_persona: A compliance officer evaluating a potential course for career development.
user_goal: To review the full content and instructor profile before enrolling.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Course Details
narrative_steps.description: John clicks on a course card titled 'Data Privacy Fundamentals' to learn more about its content.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the course card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He is redirected to the detailed course information page featuring title, image, and overview.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Instructor Profile
narrative_steps.description: Interested in the instructor's background, John scrolls down to read the instructor profile section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the instructor profile section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The instructor's name, photo, and biography are clearly displayed below the syllabus.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Related Courses
narrative_steps.description: Wanting to see similar offerings, he clicks the link to view related courses.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'View Related Courses'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page scrolls smoothly to the related courses section, showing relevant course recommendations.

requirement_tested: Implement online course enrollment functionality with user registration and login
user_persona: A new student interested in taking a cybersecurity course.
user_goal: To register for an account and enroll in a course.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Enrollment
narrative_steps.description: Emma finds a course she likes and clicks the 'Enroll Now' button but realizes she needs an account first.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Enroll Now' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Since Emma isn't logged in, she is redirected to the login/registration page.

narrative_steps.title: Creating Account
narrative_steps.description: Emma fills out the registration form with her personal details and submits it to create her account.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out the registration form and click 'Register'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Her account is created successfully, and she is automatically logged in and redirected back to the course page.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Enrollment
narrative_steps.description: Now logged in, Emma clicks 'Enroll Now' again to confirm her spot in the course.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Enroll Now' button again.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An enrollment confirmation modal appears, stating successful enrollment and providing access to course materials.

requirement_tested: Integrate a chatbot for user assistance and inquiries
user_persona: A prospective student curious about certification requirements.
user_goal: To ask questions about certification pathways via the integrated chatbot.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Chat Interface
narrative_steps.description: While browsing certifications, Alex notices the floating chat icon and clicks it to get help.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the chat icon located at the bottom right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chat window slides up from the bottom edge, ready for messaging.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: Alex types a question about how many courses are needed to earn the Certified Professional certification.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'How many courses do I need to complete the Certified Professional certification?' and press Send.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chatbot responds instantly with accurate information pulled from the certification database.

narrative_steps.title: Closing Chat
narrative_steps.description: Having received the answer, Alex closes the chat to continue exploring the site.
narrative_steps.action: Click the close button on the chat window.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chat window minimizes back to the floating icon without losing conversation history.

requirement_tested: Include a contact form for direct communication with the institute
user_persona: A company representative wanting to inquire about corporate training programs.
user_goal: To submit a detailed inquiry about customized training solutions.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Contact Page
narrative_steps.description: Mark clicks the 'Contact' link in the navigation menu to reach out to the institute directly.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Contact' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He lands on the contact page displaying both institute contact info and a form.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out Form
narrative_steps.description: Mark fills in his name, work email, subject line, and a detailed message about corporate training.
narrative_steps.action: Enter name, email, subject, and message into the respective fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All fields accept input normally, and the submit button becomes active once required fields are filled.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing his message, Mark hits the submit button to send his request.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A success message confirms that his inquiry has been sent, and an automated email is triggered to the admin team.

requirement_tested: Present certification pathway information and progression tracking
user_persona: A mid-career IT professional aiming to advance into executive leadership roles.
user_goal: To understand the Executive Leadership certification path and track progress.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Certification Pathways
narrative_steps.description: David navigates to the Certifications section to explore available certification tracks.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Certifications' link in the main navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He arrives at the certification pathways page listing all available tracks with titles and descriptions.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Pathway Details
narrative_steps.description: David clicks on the 'Executive Leadership' pathway to see what courses are required.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Executive Leadership' certification title.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He is taken to a dedicated page outlining the required courses and estimated time to complete.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Progress Status
narrative_steps.description: Logged in, David hovers over the progress indicator to check how far along he is.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the progress indicator below the pathway description.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip pops up showing he has completed 2 out of 5 required courses, with a percentage displayed.

requirement_tested: Enable users to browse courses by category, level, or certification track
user_persona: A recent graduate searching for entry-level cybersecurity courses.
user_goal: To filter courses by beginner level and Cybersecurity category.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Filters
narrative_steps.description: Priya lands on the course catalog and looks for ways to refine the course selection.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the filter icon beside the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The filter panel expands, revealing options for Category, Level, and Certification Track.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Filter Criteria
narrative_steps.description: She selects 'Cybersecurity' under Category and 'Beginner' under Level to match her experience.
narrative_steps.action: Choose 'Cybersecurity' from the category dropdown and 'Beginner' from the level dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The course grid updates immediately to show only beginner-level cybersecurity courses.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Another Filter
narrative_steps.description: Priya adds another layer by selecting the 'Certified Professional' track to align with future goals.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Certified Professional' from the certification track filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only courses belonging to the Certified Professional pathway and fitting previous criteria remain visible.

requirement_tested: Provide user account management for enrolled students
user_persona: An enrolled student checking his academic standing and earned certifications.
user_goal: To view his enrolled courses and recently earned certifications.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Raj logs into his account to check his academic progress and certifications.
narrative_steps.action: Log in using valid credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Raj is directed to his personalized dashboard with sections for personal info, enrolled courses, and certifications.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Enrolled Courses
narrative_steps.description: He scans through his enrolled courses to identify which ones are currently active.
narrative_steps.action: Scan the enrolled courses list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each course shows a clear status tag such as 'Enrolled', 'In Progress', or 'Completed'.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Earned Certifications
narrative_steps.description: Curious about his achievements, Raj clicks on one of his certification badges for verification details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a certification badge.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A pop-up or new tab opens showing verification details including issue date and credential ID.

requirement_tested: Implement a responsive navigation menu for easy site access
user_persona: A mobile user navigating the site on a smartphone.
user_goal: To easily navigate between main sections of the website using the mobile menu.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: Using his phone, Sam taps the menu icon since the full navigation bar isn’t visible.
narrative_steps.action: Tap the hamburger-style menu icon on the top right.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A vertical overlay menu slides in from the side, displaying all main navigation links.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Sections
narrative_steps.description: Sam selects 'Courses' from the menu to browse the catalog on his mobile device.
narrative_steps.action: Tap on the 'Courses' link in the mobile menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The menu closes, and he is taken to the mobile-optimized course catalog page.

narrative_steps.title: Scrolling While Navigating
narrative_steps.description: As he scrolls through course listings, the navigation stays accessible at the top of the screen.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down the course listing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The navigation bar remains fixed at the top of the viewport, ensuring persistent access.

requirement_tested: Style all pages with lavender background and indigo components
user_persona: A visually-oriented learner appreciating clean and consistent design aesthetics.
user_goal: To enjoy a cohesive visual experience across all pages of the website.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Site Theme
narrative_steps.description: Maria starts on the homepage and immediately notices the soothing lavender background and bold indigo accents.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entire page uses lavender (#E6E6FA) as the background color, with indigo (#4B0082) applied to buttons, headers, and links.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Components
narrative_steps.description: She moves her cursor over a prominent call-to-action button to observe visual feedback.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over an indigo-colored button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The button darkens slightly on hover, confirming interactivity without changing the overall color scheme.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Other Pages
narrative_steps.description: Maria explores other parts of the site and notes that the same theme persists consistently.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Contact page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All visited pages maintain the lavender background and indigo components, ensuring visual consistency.

requirement_tested: Include a homepage highlighting featured courses and certifications
user_persona: A first-time visitor exploring the institute’s offerings.
user_goal: To discover popular courses and certifications highlighted on the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Jordan lands on the homepage and is greeted by a visually appealing hero banner promoting featured content.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads with a spotlight section showcasing featured courses and certifications with headlines and summaries.

narrative_steps.title: Engaging with Featured Item
narrative_steps.description: Seeing a featured course titled 'Ethical Hacking Essentials', Jordan clicks to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the featured course card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He is redirected to the detailed course page for Ethical Hacking Essentials.

narrative_steps.title: Returning to Homepage
narrative_steps.description: After viewing the course, Jordan returns to the homepage to explore other featured items.
narrative_steps.action: Use browser back button or navigate home manually.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The homepage reloads with the same featured content still visible and accessible.

requirement_tested: Add search functionality to find specific courses or certifications
user_persona: A working professional needing a refresher on GDPR compliance.
user_goal: To quickly locate a specific certification related to data privacy laws.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Looking for a specific certification, Taylor starts typing 'GDPR' into the global search bar.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'GDPR' into the search bar located in the header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Auto-suggested matches appear instantly below the input field, including courses and certifications.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: Taylor sees a suggested certification named 'GDPR Compliance Specialist' and clicks it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the suggested certification result.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She is taken directly to the certification detail page for 'GDPR Compliance Specialist'.

narrative_steps.title: Performing Manual Search
narrative_steps.description: Not finding what she needs in suggestions, Taylor presses Enter to perform a manual search.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter after typing 'Data Protection Officer'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dedicated search results page loads, grouping matches by type (courses vs certifications).

requirement_tested: Display enrollment status and course progress for logged-in users
user_persona: An ongoing student continuing his studies after a break.
user_goal: To resume studying from where he left off in a partially completed course.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Returning to the site, Michael logs in to check his course progress.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and visit the user dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: His dashboard displays enrolled courses with labels like 'In Progress' and visual progress bars.

narrative_steps.title: Identifying Incomplete Course
narrative_steps.description: Michael identifies a course marked as 'In Progress' and clicks on it to continue learning.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the course card labeled 'In Progress'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He is directed to the course detail page with an option to resume from the last accessed module.

narrative_steps.title: Resuming Learning
narrative_steps.description: Without delay, Michael clicks the resume button to pick up exactly where he stopped.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Resume' button or equivalent CTA.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system redirects him to the last viewed lesson or quiz, preserving his study context.

requirement_tested: Provide institute contact information and location details

narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page presents structured contact information including street address, phone numbers, and emails.

requirement_tested: Ensure mobile-responsive design for all website pages
user_persona: A tablet user accessing course materials during travel.
user_goal: To comfortably navigate and consume course content on a tablet-sized screen.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Tablet
narrative_steps.description: During a commute, Noah opens the website on his tablet to review some course materials.
narrative_steps.action: Open the website in a tablet browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The layout adjusts fluidly to fit the tablet screen size, optimizing font sizes and element spacing.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Touch Elements
narrative_steps.description: Noah interacts with various UI elements designed for touch, such as larger buttons and swipeable tabs.
narrative_steps.action: Tap buttons and swipe horizontally across tabs or carousels.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive components respond accurately to touch inputs, ensuring smooth navigation and engagement.
